code: import React from"react";import styles from"./Business.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Business=_ref=>{let{business}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.Business,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.imageContainer,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:business.imageSrc,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:business.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.BusinessInformation,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.BusinessAddress,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:business.address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:business.city}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"".concat(business.state," ").concat(business.zipCode)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.BusinessReviews,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:business.category.toUpperCase()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:styles.rating,children:"".concat(business.rating," stars")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"".concat(business.reviewCount," reviews")})]})]})]});};export default Business;
